name: Classic Essence Increment
reviews: {'title': u'Effective in improving skin texture', 'text': [u'I have been using this serum for more than two months. I\'m very happy with the result it gave to my skin. I have sensitive and dehydrated skin but this serum heals. It feels so good to apply and I love the scent. I use this serum follow by aqua bomb in humid summer and moisturizing bomb in dry winter to lock in the moisture. They work very well together and I\'d say they work very well on my skin. Highly recommend!'], 'author': u'Sheep812 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-31'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Dehydrated Skin Savior', 'text': [u'I have super dehydrated skin, it\'s dry but I never experience flaking or anything like that so thick "hydrating" creams never really do enough for me. I\'ve tried a multitude of serums trying to find something to layer underneath my FAB Ultra Repair Cream to keep the dehydration at bay and this is the only serum that has been able to keep my skin hydrated and supple for more than a few hours. Definitely soothes my skin and is lightweight enough that my face doesn\'t feel smothered in skincare.'], 'author': u'EmmaAB ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': u'Lowell, MA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Jury is still out in this', 'text': [u'I like how this feels on my skin and is the first product i put on in the morning and night. I\'ve been using it for about 3 weeks. It is a nice product for the price and not as expensive as many others'], 'author': u'js5873 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-13'], 'location': u'St. Petersburg, Fl', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

name: Pomegranate Balancing Cream-Gel Moisturiser
reviews: {'title': u'lightweight but effective', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this product for about two weeks and I can already tell I love it!! It gives a balanced amount of moisture and is great on my oily skin, while still being plumping and hydrating! I don\'t seem get oily as a result of this product and I love the fact that it doesn\'t feel heavy on my skin. Definitely worth a try!'], 'author': u'vhankins ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazong', 'text': [u'I have very sensitive skin to the point where i can not even wear any sort of make up, all generic drugstore face creams make me break out, until i found korres, it is amazing my skin feels super smooth and i love the way it smells, if you are the type with easily irritate able skin you should definitely use this.'], 'author': u'tashajojo ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great moisturizer', 'text': [u'A very nice everyday moisturizer! Not too heavy, nice light smell, and actually minimized many of my fine lines!'], 'author': u'bbetty ', 'date': [u'2016-10-18'], 'location': u'Ohio', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'my skin hs never looked better', 'text': [u'I have combination, acne prone skin and this moisturizer works amazingly for me. I haven\'t broken out at all from using it. I\'ve actually been breaking out much less since I started using it but I don\'t know if it\'s because of the moisturizer. This moisturizer makes my face look So bright and smooth I couldn\'t be happier.'], 'author': u'DayR ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love to texture, not the smell', 'text': [u'I really did like this for a lightweight moisturizer, it feels great when you put it on. Your face feels like it just took a drink of water but, it doesn\'t leave any sticky residue. However, the smell is very strong. It\'s a good smell but it is really strong and I could smell it well after I put it on my face. It also woke up feeling really greasy which wasn\'t my favorite. Maybe that\'s normal because I really don\'t use very heavy moisturizers since my skin is already oily. Overall, I think most people would really love this product it just wasn\'t for me.'], 'author': u'jamlight ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': u'Gilbert, AZ', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Balancing Day Care Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Great cream for balancing tone', 'text': [u'I tried this while looking for a summer foundation. The beauty specialist applied this to even out any redness in my face before applying Estee Lauder DayWear BB cream. I love how even it makes my skin look and it will also be a great cream to wear alone in the summer. I do have combination skin and can see how others say it doesn\'t absorb well. You only need to apply a VERY small amount, though! Would definitely recommend.'], 'author': u'ClaireMcCo ', 'date': [u'2015-06-03'], 'location': u'Toronto, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Rich Moisturizer', 'text': [u'Great for sensitive,dry skin. Seems to help clear up ecsema flare ups quickly. Not greasy, but definately heavy compared to most day creams. Would not recommend for oily skin. Perfect for normal to dry skin in winter.'], 'author': u'tarheelblue ', 'date': [u'2014-02-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Most Jurlique products agree with my skin. This is no exception. Initially I thought it might not be enough for dry skin during winter, but it turned out to be very moisturizing. It also gives me that radiance and glow I usually get from using the Herbal Recovery Gel. Overall I love it, even the fragrance that others complain about.'], 'author': u'cschanel88 ', 'date': [u'2012-12-21'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Just ok', 'text': [u'I have pretty normal skin. Maybe a little drier on my cheeks and a little oilier on my T zone. This skin lotion sat like a mask on my face. name: Pore Glowing Moisture Stick
reviews: {'title': u'Great! But...', 'text': [u'I do love how this feels on my skin, but there really is almost nothing in the bottle\u2014I almost mistaked it for a sample product. Definitely not worth it for the price. I also didn\'t realize that glitter was in it. I don\'t mind the glitter, but now I will take more caution when using it.', u'What is does for my skin is just fantastic though. I could smear this on my face all day! My skin is very oily. I put this on before bed and my skin still feels soft and moisturized (but not dry or greasy). In that sense, it is a good product, but I won\'t be purchasing anymore for the price that it is.'], 'author': u'HyenaHijack ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Sparkles', 'text': [u'I agree that the balm is absorbed into the skin quickly without any sort of slick feeling, which I like, but it tugs a bit which makes me concerned about how it would apply over make up. The tube is very small -- about 3" tall at most -- and the product itself is only about half an inch. The thing that made me return it though, is the fact that it\'s sparkly. It has microglitter imbedded in the stick so that when you put the moisturizer on, you\'re essentially coating your face in sparkles. (I\'m surprised that no one else has mentioned this! I never would have bought it if I knew!)In the end, it is a very small but great non-slick moisturizer if you don\'t mind the sparkles. (I gave it three stars because although the moisturizer itself feels nice, I docked a star for the size and a star for the microglitter)'], 'author': u'kurea ', 'date': [u'2016-09-15'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Love it', 'text': [u'First of all let me say that I did not buy this to take my make-up off. For that purpose I don\'t think that it would be very good. I use a gel cleanser to take my make-up off first and then use this with my Clarisonic and I LOVE IT. It\'s very moisturizing, gentle and makes my skin feel soft. It\'s not greasy and I find the smell very pleasant. It almost has an earthy, floral smell (reminded me of Aveda products). This was my first time buying an oil cleanser and I feel that using this has really balanced out my combination skin. I had previously received a sample of a Lancome oil cleanser and I find that I like this one much better. You also only need to use one pump because a little goes a long way. Also be aware that because it is an oil it can be a little messy, especially if you use it with a Clarisonic, but to me it is worth it!'], 'author': u'lovelovell7 ', 'date': [u'2016-03-04'], 'location': u'Roy, WA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'W O W', 'text': [u'i am just beyond picky about my cleansing routine. I like it thorough but non striping. I have dry skin and since I\'m in my 40\'s anything too harsh or drying or just not right, will show.I used the Eve Lom cleanser for a year, and quite frankly, though it says it could replace your toner and moisturizer altogether, it doesn\'t. It is alright but nothing crazy.So was in the hunt for something new. Until I saw a deluxe sample of this, together with the black soap. And though it is for combo skin, the black soap, tried it either way.OMG! I have no words to express how impressed I am! Will try to do it either way.The oil is thick. Real thick. It almost seem that doesn\'t run so well on the skin, but with the warmth of your fingers, it foes. You don\'t have to tug your skin at all. So you know.It has a fragrance...but nothing offensive. Smells vintage, I think.Then you are supposed to put the soap in hot water, and splash your face with it. Then use the soap twice.The soap smells soapy and would irritate your eyes, so recommend you yo remove your eye make up with something else before.Then you rinse and splash your face with fresh water. And then, only then, you notice the miracle. Your skin appear like porcelain, velvety, soft, clean, luminous and moisturized. You could just skip the moisturizer if you want... Not like I would do that, but your skin feels do balanced and suppled, nothing like ordinary cleansers that make your skin feel tight and uncomfortable. I am on tretinoin so my skin gets real dry. But this... This was something else. And though the soap is for combo skin, worked just to perfection on my dry skin.Now, the real miracle happened the day after... The glow of my skin!!! I noticed it before jumping in the shower. Just unbelievable.I never though I would happily pay a hundred bucks for oil and soap. But I did. I cannot recommend this product enough. Fantastic!'], 'author': u'CLovesBeauty ', 'date': [u'2015-06-09'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Hydrating', 'text': [u'Excellent cleaning oil to use with Sea Mud cleansing bar. Leaves skin super clean and moisturized. Wonderful for sensitive skin.'], 'author': u'nanie1 ', 'date': [u'2015-04-02'], 'location': u'Boston, Ma', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'over 54'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Having used this product in the fall and winter in the north east, I can say for my sensitive skin, I feel I have found a perfect match! name: Melt-In Moisturizing Lotion
reviews: {'title': u'my new moiturizer', 'text': [u'I\'ve been on this quest for a good moisturizer for YEARS. My skin tends to get oily by mid-day and some products cause bumps or redness. This product keeps oiliness at bay (i still get some shine but my face doesn\'t look greasy) and i don\'t get the bumps or redness. A little goes a long way. One to two small drops, rub on both palms, then press palms on face and neck. That\'s it. My liquid makeup goes on smoothly and stays on. I think the scent is lovely. I will definitely explore other products in this line.'], 'author': u'aprilr ', 'date': [u'2016-08-15'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Light, moisturizing, cost-efficient', 'text': [u'Some information about this product: It\'s 22$ for something like 6oz of product (great price-point). It comes out as a thin gel (more liquid-y than gel) so applies smoothly and you can apply a very thin layer without using much product. It is scented and the scent will last (although it does fade a little). It doesn\'t smell artificial, and I don\'t find it overpowering but if you don\'t like floral, do not buy this line.', u'This product is moisturizing but it\'s not intensely moisturizing, so if you have dry skin or use drying products, I wouldn\'t expect this alone to work for you. (If you\'re looking for something lightly moisturizing and have oily or mild combo skin, this would probably be fine.) I use this during the day after I\'ve washed my face at the gym or have showered, to tide me over until I apply my night cream.', u'You can use a very thin layer and it works nicely and absorbs well, but until it absorbs completely it can leave a bit of a tacky residue. I don\'t use this in the morning under my makeup for that reason. (It doesn\'t take forever to absorb but it\'s not the fastest absorbing product I\'ve ever purchased.)', u'Ultimately, I can use this product and I like the price, but I won\'t repurchase - it isn\'t the right fit for me. I would be willing to recommend it for someone who is just looking for something lightly moisturizing, who doesn\'t want an oily finish on their face.'], 'author': u'frametheface ', 'date': [u'2016-04-25'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

name: Sonic Radiance™ Skin Renewing Essence Boost
reviews: {'title': u'Waste of money', 'text': [u'This product did nothing except cause me to break out. Every single time I used this I wake to new blemishes. I tried to keep using thinking it was a coincidence but it was not. I now have more discoloration and repair to do to my skin then before I started this line. Very disappointed. This scent does have a slight alcohol scent to it that smells watered down. It is very liquid almost like water but upon placing on skin there is this almost cushiony feel to it. Very hard to explain. There is also this slip it has to it. Dried fairly quickly but leaves a residue feeling on the skin. Maybe it is not residue but the moisturizing properties? It is an essence lotion (again not actual lotion but more of a toner consistency) so that it you can feel it on the skin afterwards. It leaves a slight tacky and dirty feel on the skin that I do not like. It also dulls my complexion instead of helping to brighten. Bottle is huge so if it works for you then this is a good thing. So far that is the only good thing about this product. I feel product price is much too high for what this is.'], 'author': u'ABQ505 ', 'date': [u'2016-10-10'], 'location': u'ABQ, NM', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

name: Pure Truth™ Vitamin C Youth Activating Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Awesome Product... Truth!', 'text': [u'I love this oil. I got into face oils about a year ago when they became really popular. I usually use Boscia\'s Tsubaki oil. I decided to try this recently, and I love it... I can\'t go back to the plain oil anymore! I love the scent and it feels amazing on the skin! For the people who say its too greasy or doesn\'t absorb, I think a big thing about oils is the way you apply it. I thought the same thing until I went to a rouge event last year and the Sephora associate did a demonstration on how to apply them. The best way to apply is to put a pump in the middle of you palm and rub your hands together to heat the oil and spread it around your hands, then press your hands all over your face and hold your warm hands on your face for a few seconds each time, then rub it in. This helps your skin absorb it so much and it won\'t be overly oily! I recommend this product!'], 'author': u'88Jess88 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': u'Hamilton, ON', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'good ish', 'text': [u'I like this because it\'s super hydrating, and I love the smell, I only used this at night though because I found it to be a little heavy. {'title': u'....eh', 'text': [u'I ordered this oil a couple months ago and have since stopped using it. After one month, I found I wasn\'t really seeing any dramatic results in my skin. Additionally, it made my face and neck feel greasy to the touch...and my hair, too! I had to wash my hair more often because it came into contact with my face and the oil spots on my pillow from this product.'], 'author': u'Amiphi ', 'date': [u'2016-11-02'], 'location': u'WI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'3', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'okay', 'text': [u'Not bad. Not amazing. Just a nice hydrating mist for the face. Please note I\'m talking about hydrating mist, not makeup setting spray... Anyways, if I was going to buy again I would probably get something different. {'title': u'A great all in one moisturizer', 'text': [u'I was perplexed when I saw the lower rating since I love this and the other KGD skin care products. This is a "new" product and after reviewing the lower reviews I saw they went back a couple of years. The newer reviews are spot on in there praise for this all in one moisturizer and absolutely correct that you only need to use a very small amount. The Koh Gen Do website has more information explaining how to use the products. In addition their beauty consultant is very good in answering questions via email. I\'m very pleased with their skin care and after using a few items started adding more of their line to my skin care regimen with good results.'], 'author': u'KadyMom ', 'date': [u'2015-08-02'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Amazing', 'text': [u'This felt super refreshing, and though it left my skin feeling a bit tacky, I didn\'t mind it at all. I use it at night since I\'m afraid the texture will interfere with my makeup. I\'ve used this for a couple of days now and my skin feels super nice. I love how this doesn\'t contain synthetic fragrance since my skin can be extremely sensitive. Also, the packaging is quite nice, and I like it more than Koh Gen Do\'s Oriental Plants Cream because the pump for this product is much more sanitary than having to dip your fingers into the cream everyday. Thank you Sephora for carrying this product! This has truly become a staple in my skincare regimen, and I would recommend it to anyone who just needs that extra boost of hydration.'], 'author': u'axu123 ', 'date': [u'2015-07-31'], 'location': u'San Francisco, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Favorite Daytime Moisturizer', 'text': [u'I originally got a teensy jar (.35 oz) of this as a free welcome gift with purchase from Koh Gen Do, and I was so pleased with it that I also purchased the larger, full-size (3.53 oz) enormous jar with promotional set.', u'I know this is expensive up front, but a little really goes a long way; at the rate I\'m using it it will last me at least two years, so I find the price to be very reasonable when I take into account how well this works for me and how long I project it to last. After 1.5 months of daily use, I\'m only halfway through the teensy jar; I just give my finger a little dip in the jar and it covers my entire face and neck. I haven\'t needed to start on the full-size jar yet but I did see that it comes with a spatula inside the container (pro: hygienic), so I plan on using it to spoon out the moisturizer from the big jar to the little one for everyday use (pro: great for travel). As an aside, I don\'t think this has any SPF in it (which doesn\'t bother me), but I thought I\'d mention it so anyone who is concerned about sun protection knows put some over it.It wears perfectly under my makeup, and is a great emollient daytime moisturizer that softens and protects without making me oily throughout the day. The texture is very light, and it feels like something between a gel and a regular moisturizer. I do not find this to be sticky or tacky unless I use too much, and any tackiness does fade if you just give it a few minutes. I have had no bad breakouts since I\'ve started using this (though I also started using other KGD products at the same time), which is incredible because prior to this I had been struggling with pretty much weekly breakouts for several years.This is marketed as an "All in One" moisturizer, and I definitely agree that it works best when applied directly on my skin (so save your toning lotions and serums for nighttime use), with the exception that it mixes AMAZINGLY with a few drops of the Koh Gen Do Lotion II (which is basically a super-moisturizing toning treatment "lotion")--I recommend that anyone who needs a little extra moisturizing try combining them.', u'KGD products have completely positively transformed my skin over the last six+ weeks. I\'m so obsessed and am motivated to review them because there isn\'t a lot of information or reviews out there for this amazing brand. They are definitely an investment, but the payoff for every product has been totally worth it.'], 'author': u'lilyap ', 'date': [u'2015-05-01'], 'location': u'Buffalo, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Impressive', 'text': [u'I bought this because I was curious if it would actually do anything. I\'ve heard a lot about \'essences\' and about Korean skincare in general, and my skin tends to be very dehydrated so I thought I\'d give this a whirl.', u'It\'s meant to be used after you\'ve cleansed, but before your serums/oils/moisturizer, like a toner. The texture is like water; you can pour some on a cotton pad and swipe it on your face, or just pour a little into your hands and pat it in. I\'ve been doing the latter, just using my hands (I feel like it wastes product putting it on a cotton pad) and whatever\'s left over I put on the backs of my hands. I love it! I\'ve used it for about five days now, and my face is not dehydrated at all anymore, seriously. But the real results were my hands---my knuckles are always very dry and rough, but literally I used this ONCE and the dryness was gone. Like actually gone!', u'Some people might just see this as an unnecessary extra step in their routine; but if you suffer from dehydrated or dry skin and no other product delivers for you, I\'d say give this a try!', u'Also, here\'s a full ingredients list, just because I scoured the Internet and could NOT find one, even on Erborian\'s website:', u'aqua/water, methyl gluceth-20, 1,2-hexanediol, propylene glycol, glycyrrhiza glabra (licorice) root extract, dioscorea villosa (wild yam) root extract, panax ginseng root extract, kigelia africana fruit extract, equisetum giganteum extract, zingiber officinale (ginger) extract, peg-60 hydrogenated castor oil, butylene glycol, tocopheryl acetate, disodium EDTA, parfum/fragrance, hexyl cinnamal, alpha-isomethyl ionone'], 'author': u'krachael ', 'date': [u'2016-04-15'], 'location': u'Michigan', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

reviews: {'title': u'No complaints. Leaves skin soft and radiant.', 'text': [u'This is a great lightweight alternative to Future Solution\'s day cream. When I first felt the texture, I didn\'t think it would give me enough moisture in places--it was so lightweight, but I tried it anyway, and my skin feels great and is looking great. name: Shea Butter Face Soothing Fluid
reviews: {'title': u'My New Favorite!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been a fan of L\'Occitane for over 10 years now. I started with their shea moisturizer and then switched to Imortelle for the last 5 years. Both of those were slightly heavy for me but felt so great on my easily inflamed, super sensitive, combination skin I just dealt with the oiliness. This is a game changer. My skin feels perfectly quenched and protected from the elements after using. It seems to reduce my redness and my pores are shrinking. I\'m not sure why L\'Occitane products don\'t irritate my skin like any other fragranced brand. If you have sensitive skin but want luxury products, it\'s worth a try. I can\'t live without their moisturizer, Immortelle eye gel, perfume, and extra gentle soap.'], 'author': u'CandaceTabitha ', 'date': [u'2016-09-21'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'Better than most', 'text': [u'Good straightforward ingredients no unnecessary bells and whistles. Does feel soothing on skin and it reduced my redness. Didn\'t have a strong fragrance,although I did detect a scent I\'m not sure if it was an added scent or the natural smell of the ingredients.No burning sensation when applied or itching later.Ideal packaging.This doesn\'t sink into skin like a moisturizer would, guess that why they refer to it as a soothing fluid. It forms a shield on skin in the way a good lip balm would in order to keep lips protected and moisturized.Doesn\'t look dewy or completely matte, looks like skin.I would say this can be incorporated into any skin type regimen. Oily skin types may find this to be enough on its own, Combo and normal skins can mix a small amount into their usual moisturizer or oil or apply a moisturizer to dry areas only and use this all over afterwards. Dry skins could use this as the last step to seal moisture in and add a bit more of it too.Packaging is small but less is more with this product.So far I\'m loving it.'], 'author': u'beautyyesplease ', 'date': [u'2016-07-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

Before bed I use a pore minimizing toner, this aqua-gel, and then layer a heavier cream such as origins night-a-mins. name: Rose O12 Moisture Defence Oil
reviews: {'title': u'Addicted', 'text': [u'It\'s tough to pinpoint the results of one single product when you use multiple skincare items (cleanser, mask, toner, essence, serum, moisturizer, oil, etc.). However, when I started using this oil, I was a "dry skin" type. Now I\'m normal. I add 1-2 drops of this oil every single night to the CeraVe moisturizer I\'ve been using since I was a teenager. I think that says it all right there. Also, this oil smells BOOOMMMMBBBB and it never leaves my face feeling greasy. It\'s expensive but lasts a long time because a little really does go a long way. I highly recommend REN in general. There aren\'t many brands that I trust completely but I do with REN. If you\'re contemplating picking up this oil, I\'d go for it.'], 'author': u'kelseypk ', 'date': [u'2016-10-14'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Oh, but no.', 'text': [u'I\'ll start out by saying I have normal skin. Every now and again, during season changes, the tip and bottom of my nose gets dry and flakey; however, it goes away after two to three weeks. I tried this based on the good to great reviews from other normal skinned informants. Such a bad idea for my face. At first, maybe three to four days, my face peeled.. and I don\'t mean a slight peeling from a burn I had, I mean IT! PEELED! EVERYWHERE! Under my brows, on my cheeks, on my burn! I KNEW it was from this moisturizer. I used a serum or oil under it for one day and that seemed to do the trick for 3/4 of my out-and-about day and then my face would start showing signs of peeling again. The next stage? I started to break out. For about 8 to 10 hours, I believed it was because I was getting PMS pimples. When I checked my face that night, the entire bottom half of my face had broken out! I had an immediate desire to pop everything on my face but they were all VERY sensitive to the touch.. washing my face that night was a horrible experience. I stopped using this moisturizer and was finally able to return it yesterday. On account of not using it for three days: the redness on the southern half of my face has almost disappeared, I have four left over pimples and one overly sensitive face demon on my cheek, and I am no longer peeling. I have no idea what was in this moisturizer but I will NEVER touch it again! Not even as a sample five years down the road. No way, no how. If this product works for you, that\'s great. For me, no.'], 'author': u'JordannL ', 'date': [u'2014-10-28'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'Great Cream', 'text': [u'I love this moisturizer. I\'ve tried other brands with sunscreen, and they\'ve always been greasy and thick. This goes on smooth and absorbs quickly. I use powder on top of it and it looks great all day.'], 'author': u'Anne86 ', 'date': [u'2013-12-04'], 'location': u'Princeton, NJ', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Non-Irritating', 'text': [u'I have combo. skin that is very sensitive. I\'ve recently been seeing a derm. for special problems. The new meds. make my skin a little dry and I have to be careful with sun exposure. This stuff goes on very smooth, blends well and goes a long way. I was very impressed with a sample I received, so I am purchasing an entire bottle. The most impressive thing is that when I use this product, I get NO irritation and it\'s fragrance-free. I am a little disappointed that the price is so expensive, but I think this product is worth the cost. I also like the fact that they use natural ingredients.'], 'author': u'VenusDoll ', 'date': [u'2013-08-16'], 'location': u'Churubusco, Indiana', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

name: Day Cream
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I really need to figure out which beauty blog I read about this day cream on so I can go back and buy everything else they recommend. I have been using this consistently for about 2 months and my skin looks fantastic. This has evened out my skin tone, reduced fine lines and I haven\'t had a zit since I started using it. I was worried about retinol in a day cream since I can be sensitive to retinol, especially when exposed to sun, but I have had no problems with this. (I read somewhere that it is marketed as having SPF in the EU, but it isn\'t in the US).'], 'author': u'caitster ', 'date': [u'2016-06-06'], 'location': u'Washington DC', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'Seems overpriced to me but it\'s a good product; it seems to be calming and has virtually eliminated my breakouts, if I stop using it I start breaking out a few days later. I have to occasionally alternate with something more moisturizing, especially when I first started using it, as it can dry out my skin. I have sensitive skin, so using it with Verso\'s night cream in the same day is too much for my skin, so I usually use Caudalie\'s moisturizing mask as a night cream with this.'], 'author': u'easilyaddicted ', 'date': [u'2016-01-09'], 'location': u'Boston', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I don\'t usually write reviews, but this stuff is pretty much life-changing. I\'m getting older (early 30s) so I knew I needed to start looking into skincare with retinol and other anti-wrinkle properties. I found this product via Sephora\'s skin care quiz and the other reviews led me to spring for it even though it is quite expensive. However, it is worth every penny. I have had skin problems my whole life and my skin is very sensitive to everything -- except this product. I never breakout from it and my oily skin always feels perfectly moisturized without feeling greasy. I used to get random dry patches around my forehead and chin, but that never happens anymore! Even though it is expensive, I use just one drop and I am good to go -- this way it ends up lasting me for months (6 months for the last bottle I bought). I get compliments all the time and people are always asking what I do to make my skin glow and look so good. I really can\'t recommend it enough!'], 'author': u'brittlewoman ', 'date': [u'2015-06-24'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Amazing!', 'text': [u'I have never been so moved to write a review in my life. My skin was stressed, breaking out, dry in places, oily in others...it was a mess. I found this on Sephora\'s site and took a chance. I have NEVER had a skin care product do what it says it will for me, ever! But this one preformed amazingly! so much that I sprung for the rest of the line. Seems cheaper than going to a Derm, which now I don\'t have to do thanks to this amazing product!! I wish I had done before and after photos.'], 'author': u'Iiriish10 ', 'date': [u'2015-05-05'], 'location': u'California', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'There should really be a SPF listing on the bottle or in the description as it is SPF 15.', u'This is the first retinol cream I can handle, my skin is very sensitive to retinol and derivatives. name: HydraClear™ Hydrating Acne Gel
reviews: {'title': u"Run, Don't Walk", 'text': [u'As someone with sensitive, combination, acneic skin, who also suffers with seasonal bouts of rosacea, I can tell you this effective product is a pleasure to use. That\'s why I\'m heading out to my local Sephora at daybreak and buying every last one... Sadly, I just found out that Kate Somerville has discontinued this product and replaced it with DermalQuench Clear, which Sephora does not yet stock and I have not yet trialled. It\'s probably just as great, if not better, but I\'m not taking any chances.'], 'author': u'BeautyWarner ', 'date': [u'2016-10-16'], 'location': u'US/HK', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'overnight!', 'text': [u'I had an under the skin painful acne and I used this gel for the first time after a very gentle oxygen mask and the next morning I can barely feel the bump and it\'s not painful to the touch anymore! My skin is typically oily but it\'s been getting dry areas with the changing temperature so I decided to give this a try...I might have to start using this for winter! I can attribute it to this more than the mask because mask helps mildly exfoliate the skin but this gel actually treated and reduced the pimple. ', u'For those people with oily skin using this and complaining that it was making their skin too oily....WHAT DO YOU EXPECT??? ', u'It\'s called HYDRATING for a reason...if you\'re oily skinned and want something to treat your acne and also control oil...find products with the words Mattifying or oil control in it, NOT one that says hydrating. Common sense people.'], 'author': u'rubyz ', 'date': [u'2016-08-31'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'The best!', 'text': [u'I have had spot acne most of my life. Either tiny, annoying spots or nasty cysts. The worst thing is when your acne medicine dries out the skin in the breakout area, then the dreaded scaling and peeling happens. I\'ve tried so many different products, none really work well. Either they aren\'t strong enough to fight the spot, or they cause dryness that lasts for days. This gel has been perfect for me. It clears small spots within hours in some cases, and never dries my skin. I highly recommend this product!!!'], 'author': u'kmargelot ', 'date': [u'2016-08-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love this stuff!', 'text': [u'I received this as a Birchbox sample months ago and have been hooked ever since! I have been battling hormonal/cystic acne for years and have tried a ridiculous number of acne products - this gel is the best thing I have found. After a couple of applications, my breakouts shrink drastically and are completely gone in a couple of days. Though it is expensive, it\'s worth every penny and the tube goes a long way!'], 'author': u'vicbril ', 'date': [u'2016-07-15'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Preventive Only', 'text': [u'I have a serious bout of breakouts for the past few months and it is still an ongoing concern. Aside from doing peels and masks, I need something I could use under my moisturizer as well for all day prevention. I chose this since it reduces and prevents. {'title': u'Hidden Secret', 'text': [u'I ordered this product on a whim to try something new and I feel lucky to have come across the Cinema Secrets Moisture Spray & Hydrating Mist.', u'General Info:My skin is normal to dry - Makeup Forever HD Stick - Tarte By the Sea Concealer - Cinema Secrets Translucent powder (under eyes) - Sephora Mineral Powder.I only listed the products I used for foundation and concealer. ', u'I have tried this spray multiple ways and I have been thoroughly impressed. I had better results than the UD setting spray. The way I used this product is as follows: I moisturized, spray this all over my face and while still damp applied my Make-Up Forever HD foundation and blended with a brush. It went on seamless. Then continued with concealer and set with powder and applied another spritz to set everything. I finished applying the rest of my makeup and then used another spritz to set everything. I spent the day outside enjoying the 80 degree weather and removed my makeup about 12 hours later and NONE of my makeup moved except on my nose where my sunglasses rest. My makeup DID NOT show any signs of breaking up or make my face oily. I was thoroughly impressed. ', u'I used this spray as a base, in between and finally setting and was 100% satisfied and would recommend to my family & friends. ', u'The only negative is I would prefer a finer spray mist.', u'Give it a try you won\'t be disappointed.'], 'author': u'mumbelina ', 'date': [u'2016-04-17'], 'location': u'San Jose, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

I find it much better to use with matte foundations (which is what I wear the most) and it wont pull off my foundation like the Anastasia kit likes to do. The colours are great for me, but I am pale. I think most people\'s issues with this item (other than colour) is they are not using it correctly. it is a concealer so it has that consistency, its not creamy, and you have to build with it. if you are looking for a \'creamy\' contour kit this is not for you.'], 'author': u'sayraht ', 'date': [u'2016-08-04'], 'location': u'Austin, TX', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great!', 'text': [u'The only thing I do no like about this product is the lack of color options for different people. The application is not great; however, I put it on the areas I want the color on--first with the step 1 neutralizer--then blend with my damp beauty blender..followed by the 2nd step of bronzer which is more of a contour..then apply the highlight with finger. It just so happens that the color goes great with my skin! Also, the contouring step has a green undertone which helps it not look as if it is dirty. I love it! I also put a light powder over it, which helps let it stay-stays all day long-and can achieve a matte or dewy look depending on your powder preference.'], 'author': u'MadiGray ', 'date': [u'2016-07-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Great Moisturizer', 'text': [u'At last a great moisturizer that provides a physical sun protection at a reasonable price. This moisturizer is a dream. A little goes a long way and it sinks right into my skin. While it does have an initial whitish cast, that quickly goes away as the moisturizer sinks into my skin. It does not irritate my sensitive skin and doesn\'t get greasy by the end of the day. I have no problems putting foundation on top of this moisturizer - some of these moisturizers have products that cause everything to ball up when I put on foundation. And, it\'s a great price, considering that I like a moisturizer with a high SPF and was spending twice the amount for ReVive\'s moisturizer with an equivalent SPF.'], 'author': u'babymelsmom ', 'date': [u'2015-05-05'], 'location': u'Baltimore, MD', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'45-54'}

reviews: {'title': u'Works great for mild acne', 'text': [u'I\'ve used this BB cream for two years now, and even after trying different brands I keep coming back to this for two reasons, it offers sheer coverage, without looking made up, perfect for everyday usage and it keeps my skin relatively clear compared to other BB creams, I have combination skin which tends to get oilier during the summer, and i figured the best way to use this BB cream is to layer it with a light weight moisturizer, I use the Dr. Jart ceramidin serum under this BB cream and this gives me enough coverage and moisture.'], 'author': u'RamzK ', 'date': [u'2016-03-08'], 'location': u'Foster City, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'great product', 'text': [u'Surprisingly, it does exactly what it says it will. I have neutral skin tone, the medium color was a perfect match for me. Doesn\'t cause any irritation on my combination skin, using it regularly, my skin seems to be in great condition even when I\'m not wearing it.'], 'author': u'francoisev ', 'date': [u'2016-02-16'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Poor coverage; good oil control', 'text': [u'Looking at the name of this product, you\'d think that it would be suitable for oily, acne-prone skin, right? Yes and no. Good oil control but at the cost of cakes texture. Hard to blend. When applying, you can feel it go from liquidy to powdery, which is nice, but blend QUICKLY. Once it sets to a powdery texture it will get cakey if you try to continue blending. Does NOT cover acne and scars. Looks like you\'re not wearing any coverage at all. Keep that in mind! Light/medium suits my Asian skin by the way. Has golden undertones.'], 'author': u'Tiena ', 'date': [u'2016-02-03'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really Good!', 'text': [u'I live in a tropical city with a oily skin and this product has a good performance.'], 'author': u'Mafer18 ', 'date': [u'2015-10-08'], 'location': u'Caracas, Venezuela', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Really love this product BUT...', 'text': [u'This product is good for oily skin. I have medium/olive skin-tone and I feel that this product provides sheer-to-light coverage, making it look like you\'re not wearing a product though effectively evening out your skin-tone. I prefer the look of this BB cream over foundations because it looks more natural. I have gotten compliments when I switched from a light foundation to this BB cream. At the end of the day, there is slight cakey-ness; however, blotting with a tissue quickly resolves that. Though this product is part of EL\'s acne treatment line, I find that this product breaks me out horribly. I\'m not too sure why my skin is reacting so poorly to this BB cream. When I discontinue use of the BB cream for a few days, my acne clears up relatively quickly, but resumes the moment I start using this product again. I think that this BB cream is ideal for others like me with oily, medium/olive skin-tone - I just hope others don\'t have the same negative reaction to it.'], 'author': u'BOStoRDU ', 'date': [u'2015-08-02'], 'location': u'Raleigh, NC', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

reviews: {'title': u'Not what I thought', 'text': [u'I adore TF beauty products but this was a dud. I believe it could have been used nicely on the body, maybe the legs and shoulders for a night out but given the price and that it\'s not what I was wanting, it went back.'], 'author': u'coryc77 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-15'], 'location': u'Chicago, IL', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'such a beautiful product', 'text': [u'i love it so much. not glittery at all. it just give your face a nice glow that is beyond words .great as a primer as well.i will buy a back up for sure .a little goes a long way. my new holy grail.'], 'author': u'metoocool ', 'date': [u'2016-06-10'], 'location': u'toronto', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u'SO GLITTERY!', 'text': [u'Boy oh boy am I disappointed with this. The texture is lovely, lightweight, while still being very moisturizing. It has this lovely, refreshing texture. However, contrary to some reviews online and the descriptions, there are indeed large pieces of glitter, as opposed to a shimmer. I was hoping this would give that ever-so-elusive glowing, youthful dewiness that I can\'t ever seem to find, and I loved the idea of a glowing moisturizer under makeup that could also be worn just by itself for those days that you don\'t want to wear makeup. Why doesn\'t that exist?! I just can\'t imagine how people would like this obvious glitter, it is just tacky looking.'], 'author': u'Mugsy48 ', 'date': [u'2016-04-23'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'bummer', 'text': [u'I never write reviews, but I feel like I had todincr no one else has commented. ', u'First of all I couldn\'t find anywhere on the website if it\'s unisex, male or female product. It does have beautiful smell typical of the Blue line, little bit masculine, but very subtle. I do own their several Eue de Toilette and love the smell.  The problem I had with it, is that it\'s advertised as a moisturizer. It\'s not a cream lotion. It\'s a tonic like lotion (liquid). name: Eye Duty Triple Remedy Overnight Balm
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I absolutely love this product! I\'m a volgger on YouTube { Life of Harry } and I have tried a lot of different types of eye creams to review, this is one is definitely one of my favorites! I am only 18 and don\'t really struggle with under eye bags/wrinkles but I am super super dry and it does hydrate my eyes like crazy! I let myMother, who just turn 50, use it for a couple days and she immediately noticed a difference! And it\'s super important to use a firming/hydrating eye cream while young so you don\'t get any of those fine lines and wrinkles when you get older! But I definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants to spend invest in a incredible product!'], 'author': u'harrymgray ', 'date': [u'2016-10-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Canadian Winter Lifesaver!', 'text': [u'This past winter I started getting dry flaky patches on my eyelids... Because who doesn\'t love new skin issues popping up?? I tried this product on recommendation of a local Sephora staff and it was amazing! A little goes a long way and the product lasted about 3 months! I loved it because it was sensitive enough to put under the eye, on the lid and up to the brow bone. I repurchased another run in the spring but found it was a little heavy for the hot summer we experienced this year. name: Resurgence® Age–Balancing Moisture Broad Spectrum SPF 30
reviews: {'title': u'Seems to improve my skin', 'text': [u'I have to say, I do like this product. It is a really great moisturizer. It smells nice and isn\'t too greasy. I use it along with Murad\'s Retinol Youth Renewal Serum. I normally would never spend this much on a moisturizer, but my skin has really started changing lately. I had to stop relying on the drugstore products I\'d been using and step my game up. I don\'t like wearing foundation on a regular basis, I\'d rather have nice smooth skin. I don\'t know how good this product would be on its own, but using it in the morning with the retinol serum at night, my skin has shown visible improvement. My skin looks way way better after only a week. It\'s pricey for what seems like such a small amount of product. But it is working for me.'], 'author': u'puremix ', 'date': [u'2016-09-19'], 'location': u'Houston, TX', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Love!', 'text': [u'So, I have been buying the Murad Resurgence kits for two to three months now. I really noticed that I go through the moisturizer quicker than anything else and use it more than anything else in the kit. Finally, I bought the full size of this the other day, and yes, it is expensive, as it is priced at $70; however, it is worth every penny. I have combo skin, and my T zone is more on the oily side. In the winter, my skin is drier. This product, in combination with the Murad cleansing wipes (which are in a white and blue package and the only wipes they sell) are the perfect combination for my skin. I will continue to repurchase this item, and I will more than likely purchase the full size of everything from the resurgence kit, except for the cleanser. The Murad wipes have pretty much replaced my cleanser, and the cleanser that comes in the kit lasts forever. I still have 1 and 1/2 bottles of cleanser left. I will use these, after O shower or before putting on makeup. (Skin care to me is top priority, and I will ALWAYS take care of my skin if I plan to wear makeup). I highly recommend this, and you will NOT be disappointed if you have combo skin like mine, drier skin in the summer, and you want something that is not greasy or oily. I also love that it is anti aging. I am only 24, but I feel it is a good time to start an anti aging regimen. I cannot speak on behalf of wrinkles, as I do not have any; however, I did have laugh lines, and this got kid of them very quickly. My laugh lines were not deep or insane, but this really has made them disappear, since they were something that I could always see, even though my fianc\xe9 kept saying I look the same.'], 'author': u'Shas17 ', 'date': [u'2016-02-14'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not what I hoped for', 'text': [u'I have very dry skin, especially so in winter. I had hoped that this moisturizer would hydrate better. {'title': u'Skin Brightening Non-oily Moisturizer - Amazing!', 'text': [u'I recently had a facial for the first time, and purchased this product as a result of learning what skin care regimen I needed to start practicing.I had used plenty of over the counter moisturizers in the past, most leaving my face feeling too greasy.This product is amazing! It provides a nice amount of moisture without that heavy feeling, and the absolute plus for me is that it has a very light glow and leaves you looking radiant! A few days into using the Resurgence kit, I noticed my skin looked so much brighter and full. I highly recommend this line! I never worried about caring for my skin, and now that I use these products, I don\'t know how I ever managed!'], 'author': u'MrsN827 ', 'date': [u'2015-11-19'], 'location': u'New York, NY', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

reviews: {'title': u'Light and Long Lasting', 'text': [u'I have very oily skin, and wearing this primer feels so good. {'title': u'Loved It', 'text': [u'This is a great primer! I have and olive/tan skin and have combo to oily skin and I do have occasional breakouts. I definitely don\'t have any severe acne or anything but sometimes with my diet and stresses of the day I tend to break out and they are red! This primer has helped so much that in some cases, depending on the size of the breakout, it\'ll be gone by the end of the day. It\'s a great barrier between my skin and foundation and helps to keep my pores from being clogged. I don\'t get any new breakouts while I have it on and I absolutely do see a difference every time I apply it. It also keeps my skin from getting oily.. leaves a demi matte finish and I absolutely love it. Would definitely recommend if you have the same struggles as me!'], 'author': u'Navi01 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-04'], 'location': u'Toronto, ON', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'love this product', 'text': [u'I received this as a sample and immediately purchased. I have 45 year old oily skin and have tried many creams in the past. This one is the best I\'ve ever used! Lightweight, smells fantastic and spa clean, absorbs quickly and feels great going on. I\'ve had no breakouts and no reactions, it plumped my skin and I felt hydrated and smoothed. There was no irritation or redness and my skin didn\'t feel like it had a layer of anything on it. It has helped with fine lines and since it isn\'t touted as a heavy age cream for larger lines, I didn\'t expect more from it. I have repurchased and have been using for half a year. The jar when using twice a day lasts me 4 months. Worked great in winter and summer weather. I have recently been trying a heavier cream at night so am only using once a day right now but would not ever give up using this gel, its wonderful!'], 'author': u'momaddicted ', 'date': [u'2016-08-08'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Residue', 'text': [u'Let me first by explaining my skin. I am 42 years old with a good, even complexion. I have some fine lines, loss of elasticity and a dullness that comes with age (for you youngins....I\'ve lost my glow...LOL). I tend to have dry skin as well. I wanted to kick up my moisturizering a notch and didn\'t mind how much it would cost...if it WORKED! Went to Sephora for advice and they suggested this brand. They gave me a 2 week sample (I was amazed they would give so much). I was so excited to try a $150 moisturizer, but my dreams were dashed the first day. First, it has a pleasant scent, it spreads smoothly and dries quickly (too quick for my liking). After it "dries"....it felt like I had residue or second layer on my face. After I applied my makeup it looked horrible. I know with new moisturizer, you need to keep at it...so I tried again (3x\'s)! Same thing each time...I gave up after my third attempt. So thankful I didn\'t buy this, as I would\'ve been out $150 dollars. I\'ll stick to Origin\'s "Three Part Harmony".'], 'author': u'rjv4EVER ', 'date': [u'2016-05-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

name: Plantscription™ SPF 25 Power Anti-Aging Oil-Free Cream
reviews: {'title': u'Perfect for oily, sensitive skin', 'text': [u'My friend told me about the plantscription line after I voiced concerns about my face looking a little aged lately (I think it was just the acne I was going through) so I decided to get a sample of this oil free cream. I have incredibly oily, sensitive, acne prone skin and this moisturizer has been a miracle worker so far. My breakouts have gone away completely and I\'ve noticed a reduction in the overall oiliness of my skin. People talk about the smell but I honestly haven\'t noticed it! It smells like all other face creams to me. It goes on smoothly and is a great primer for my BB cream. I think I\'m going to have to save up and actually buy this! 10/10. Definitely recommend.'], 'author': u'Jordanrich ', 'date': [u'2016-11-01'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': None, 'text': [u'I\'m not sure how to feel about this. I wanted to make it work but it really is just another sunscreen for the face. I was sold by the anti-aging part part in the title but I really think that some drugstore products work better and not to mention are less expensive. It\'s got this weird smell and I have to drag it on to my skin which I didn\'t like because that would lead to premature wrinkles. I guess it\'s just like any other sunscreen in which it make your skin a little oiler after, but for the price I would want it to work better. Not a horrible product by any means, but I would not purchase again.'], 'author': u'mandyyy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Vancouver, B.C., Canada', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

{'title': u'great!', 'text': [u'I\'ve tried a few oil free moisturizers and each didn\'t really absorb and just sat on top of my skin and felt really tacky but this one doesn\'t do that and I also didn\'t break out when I started using it which is a great sign! I have weird combination skin where everywhere but my forehead is oily and my forehead is SO DRY and it gives enough moisture for my forehead to not look and feel like the Sahara desert and light enough for everywhere else!'], 'author': u'carebie ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: GENIUS White Brightening Moisture Softener
reviews: {'title': u"Moisturizes and that's it", 'text': [u'I\'ve used twice daily for a month now and there has been absolutely NO difference in lightening my spots. If I saw even a slight difference, I would continue using it. After all of the reviews, I thought this would definitely work. Algenist claims 90% saw a difference. I must be in the 10%. I didn\'t use a cotton pad, I applied it directly to my face so I wouldn\'t waste any of it. It\'s not watery like a regular toner, it\'s a little thicker so it\'s easier to use. It does moisturize, but so does a moisturizer. Thank you, Sephora, for your return policy, otherwise I would have been stuck with this.'], 'author': u'kellyrh ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': u'Indiana', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'baby soft skin', 'text': [u'Oh my goodness I love this stuff! My skin has changed dramatically since using this I had slight sun marks on my cheeks and they have almost fade it completely after using it for about two weeks. I honestly sit here touching my face constantly because I Can\'t believe how amazing it feels. I almost didn\'t buy it because of the price this is a receive some cards for my birthday I decided to make a splurge and now this is definitely going to stay a part of my skin care routine. You don\'t need a lot just a couple drops for your whole face I use my fingers because I\'m not wasting this product at all. it does say to use before moisturizer but honestly sometimes my skin feels so good afterwards if I\'m going to sleep I don\'t use it. {'title': u'wow!', 'text': [u'It effectively works on my skin (I\'m Asian), within a week I noticed the difference on my skin, all the dark spots from acne and sun are faded, and now I\'m at my second week of using it, I see a HUGE difference! My skin has never as smooth, bright, and even tone! as right now! I have been using over the counter but nothing work right and effective as this product before (I also use clearasonic brush). {'title': u"Sun Spots Just Like Mom Said I'd Get...", 'text': [u'Sunscreen, pffft...who needs it says my teenage self! Well, this fair Irish 40-ish yr old DID! I have pigmentation on my face and neck that I had hoped would just all join together to make me look tan. Since that is not going down, I bought this product a few weeks ago and started using it once a day. I can honestly say, it does not break me out (everything breaks me out), it is not heavy, and I have seen my skin look brighter/hydrated and a little lightening in my sun spots. I use under my moisturizer (with SPF 30!). It is suggested to use twice a day and I need to get better about that so I can have better results- Long and short of it, I would definitely recommend Algenist Genuis. I have tried other potions from Sephora like First Aid Beauty and Clinique among others and have not had the same results.'], 'author': u'follywolly ', 'date': [u'2016-09-22'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Perfect moisturizer', 'text': [u'Let me preface this by saying that I have never written a review. I have been shopping at Sephora for a decade, have spent more money than I care to admit as a self-proclaimed makeup and skincare junkie. I have incredibly dry skin that is also prone to break outs. I have been using Dr. Jart\'s ceramidin liquid and cream which I have been very happy with, but as I\'m getting older I wanted to add a face cream with peptides. A Sephora ingredients search led me to this cream. I mulled it over for awhile and reviewed the ingredients list. I pulled the plug and hoped for the best. I was NOT expecting this cream to be so wonderful. First off, I used too much the first time. You only need a very small amount. The texture of the cream seemed a little tacky and sticky, so I assumed it would not sit well on my skin or wear well under foundation. Boy was I wrong. After massaging into my skin over my serum, it felt so good and soothing. My makeup went on perfectly. A few hours later, I was shocked at how good my makeup and skin looked. It visibly looked smoother and tighter and I didn\'t have a dry spot in sight. I have been using it for almost a week now and I\'m in love. It takes a lot for me to say that. I am nervous to say this is my new holy grail moisturizer, but it is heading that way.'], 'author': u'smangelina ', 'date': [u'2016-05-31'], 'location': u'Nashville, TN', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Fantastic!', 'text': [u'I sampled this product a few months ago and like all the Dr Jart + products I\'ve tried I LOVED it. It has a very tacky consistency which is quite pleasant especially in the mornings before applying makeup. It almost acts like a primer. It\'s extremely moisturizing as well. Now to the real point of the cream- I have seen a visible improvement in my fine lines and skin texture. I\'m definitely a fan of this cream even with the price tag. It\'s worth every penny especially since this tube will last well over a year. Very little product is needed for an application. 1/2 a pea size drop or less! BUY THIS!'], 'author': u'RetroRhoda ', 'date': [u'2016-05-27'], 'location': u'Maine', 'skin_type_link': u'Normal', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

It gives me an appearance of my skin almost not having pores (like many, the pores on my cheeks are a bit large), refreshed. I am really enjoying this cream, and even when I don\u2019t believe I need really bad I might invest in it for just a great makeup day.'], 'author': u'kabukik ', 'date': [u'2016-05-02'], 'location': u'San Diego, CA', 'skin_type_link': u'Dry', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'35-44'}

{'title': u"I'm pleasantly surprised....", 'text': [u'I typically steer toward certain brands Sephora sells for skincare, which doesn\'t include Sephora-branded skincare. Usually, the stock of products that I regularly use would probably buy a day cruise somewhere. I don\'t pay much attention to hype or gimmicks, but rather ingredient lists and results.', u'With that said, it took three months of back and forth to Sephora to find a sleeping mask that was hydrating without either feeling like glue, nothing at all, or breaking out my combo skin, that also produced as promised. I\'m not a fan of additive fragrance in any skincare as the $ spent on perfumes could be replaced with beneficial ingredients. So yes, it does smell nice, but it\'s not a buying factor for me (especially when you look at the markup on parfumes - holy mother).', u'Overall, I can say this is my favorite sleeping mask for hydration, and I wake up with the softest skin that I almost hate to wash the mask off. Plus, I save a ton of time in the morning NOT having to peel my face off my pillow just to realize I need to cover an already-angry-and-it-isn\'t-even-six-a.m. zit. Win. Win.'], 'author': u'mordia ', 'date': [u'2016-08-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Love it!', 'text': [u'This face "mask" doesn\'t feel like a mask after you apply it. It doesn\'t come off on your pillow or clothing and acts more as a moisturizer than a true "mask". I use it a couple times a week in conjunction with another night cream on other nights, and my skin feels great!'], 'author': u'Leo41 ', 'date': [u'2016-08-17'], 'location': u'Blue Ridge Mts', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'love it', 'text': [u'I use this 2 times a week on a cleansed face and neck. It smells amazing and it sinks into my skin like gel and then it feels like cream (very moisturizing). My skin feels and looks healthy in the morning.'], 'author': u'Assyrian ', 'date': [u'2016-08-17'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Advanced Anti-Aging Repairing Oil
reviews: {'title': u'works wonders', 'text': [u'I was hesitant and skeptical to buy this oil for a couple of reasons: the price, the fact that I\'d be putting oil on my face, and I wasn\'t sure I bought the anti-aging claim. However, I\'ve been using this product for two or three months now and my skin has honestly never looked better. I haven\'t broken out once, only a very occasional spot, since I\'ve started using this product, and I feel like it\'s left my skin glowing. Even better, you can hardly even tell I\'ve been using this product religiously (3 drops a night) because there\'s still so much product left in the bottle. Definitely worth the price, and surpassed all my expectations.'], 'author': u'lap8693 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'tiny red textured bumps', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using using this oil mixed in with jojoba oil for the past 5 days. Now I\'ve broken out in tiny red bumps, not zits, just textured red bumps, all over my cheeks and forehead. My skin care consists of the Clarisonic and moisturizer. Adding this anti-aging oil was supposed to help, and that did not happen. I don\'t have sensitive skin, but maybe this oil has ingredients that are not compatible with my skin type. Don\'t know. Stopping use immediately.'], 'author': u'robynzentilli ', 'date': [u'2016-10-25'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'1', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'good stuff!', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using this for the past year and have seen dramatic results in my smile wrinkles. I put two drops on my hand, dab a bit on my smile lines and then mix the rest with Acure day cream and spread it all over my face. I\'m 32, and I\'ve been ID\'ed more this year then most of my twenties.'], 'author': u'chickijill ', 'date': [u'2016-08-26'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Life Changing for Dry Skin', 'text': [u'I love Algenist, it\'s all I use. I noticed in the past 2 years my skin had become dry - i think it\'s hormonal/aging and wasn\'t sure what to do. I added this in (2 drops) to my face cream in AM and PM. It is a game changer. My skin is so soft and dewy, but not at all oily. Plus the Algenist spf Sublime Defense day cream goes on so much nicer with this oil I didn\'t like it used under cream but love the mixture. My face is not happy if I skip an application. It\'s just the perfect product.'], 'author': u'maejlucky7 ', 'date': [u'2016-06-26'], 'location': u'Los Angeles, CA', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'A Must Have', 'text': [u'Moisturizing, great for both day and night, and erases fine lines. I\'ve seen reviews that say this product is too oily. I thought the same until I started using it per the directions - three drops in the hand, rub, then pat onto your face. A lot goes a long way!!'], 'author': u'CarriB ', 'date': [u'2016-06-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

name: Clean Break™ Oil-Free Moisturizer
reviews: {'title': u'I FOUND IT!!!!', 'text': [u'Ok I\'m going to start by saying that my face is super oily....like SUPER oily. Like I blot my face multiple times a day and every moisturizer is crazy heavy. Well let me tell you....I got a sample through an online order I placed, which Sephora, by the way, providing those samples is genius, because I thought "meh...I think this is supposed to be for men, not really sure, but whateves, I will try it." I\'m floored by this moisturizer because it is PERFECT for my skin. It feels like it hydrates, it\'s not heavy at all, I don\'t need to blot until like noon now (before I would legit blot by like 8:30 am) and it feels so nice!! I love love love this stuff and ended up buying it. It\'s my new go-to and I think Sephora needs to advertise this one more!!!!!'], 'author': u'Laura0388 ', 'date': [u'2016-11-03'], 'location': u'Guelph, Ontario', 'skin_type_link': u'Oily', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'ARE YOU SERIOUS', 'text': [u'I was on a hunt for a trouble-free breakout-free It\'s-just-sitting-on-my-skin-free moisturizer. I have a few items already on their way because I hadn\'t found the right one. This fell through the sephora search cracks and I am completely appalled at that it did! I used the sample and IT WAS AMAZING. All the breakout dissipated and I\'m going to keep using it to see if it helps to restore my skin to pre-breakout condition. So far though, PRAISE!'], 'author': u'sephlie ', 'date': [u'2016-10-26'], 'location': u'MA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'25-34'}

{'title': u'Perfect', 'text': [u'I bought this for my husband because he loved the sample I got for him at Sephora. He says it\'s hands down the best moisturizer he\'s ever used. It helps keep his face shine free, too.'], 'author': u'jenn4joy ', 'date': [u'2016-10-20'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'HOLY GRAIL moisturizer', 'text': [u'This is the BEST moisturizer I have ever used. I have relatively dry skin, but I hate using thick and heavy moisturizers. This stuff is so light and yet still so hydrating and toning! My face feels like a baby\'s face. This brand is technically marketed to men (I am a woman), but the consultant I spoke with in the store told me it was actually created by two wives, and I have to say that I think it works great for any gender. I highly recommend this stuff.'], 'author': u'Duhlaynee ', 'date': [u'2016-07-11'], 'location': u'Flowery Branch, GA', 'skin_type_link': u'Combination', 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': u'18-24'}

name: GenOptics Spot Essence
reviews: {'title': None, 'text': [u'I was very anxious to try this product, yet hesitant at the same time. My skin is sensitive, but luckily I didn\'t have any bad reactions. There\'s no overwhelming smell, and had it not been for the lovely Ohio summers, I\'m sure it would have absorbed into my skin nicely. Unfortunately, it\'s been very humid, and every time i used this product my face just felt very tacky, my hair would stick to it and just irritate me to no end. As for results I haven\'t noticed any difference, but most likely it needs to be used for more than a month. I will have to continue to use-especially during the fall and winter months and see what kind of results I have then. Thank you sk-ll for sending me this product complimentary to try.'], 'author': u'bethanyh34 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-19'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'SK-11', 'text': [u'I\'ve been using SK-11 for a month now and I have enjoyed the way it feels on my face. It\'s not greasy and mixes well with my lotion. I\'m not sure that I\'ve noticed large differences in my skins complexion, but I will definitely continue to experiment with it. I received a full size bottle to try complimentary from SK-11.'], 'author': u'danielleflorey ', 'date': [u'2016-09-14'], 'location': u'Sparks, NV', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worth every penny', 'text': [u'This is such a great silky serum. I love the design of the bottle and the ease of the dropper. I have used this product for 5 weeks and have noticed an improvement on my 10 year old acne scars and hyper pigmentation. The formula is light and makes my skin feel fresh and smooth. I did notice the recommended dosage was a little too much for my face so I began to use half the amount. I would say the only down side to this product is the price, although for all that it has done for my skin I am willing to pay it. I have received this product complimentary from SK-II for my honest review.'], 'author': u'SailorBethy ', 'date': [u'2016-09-13'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Worked pretty well on my middle aged skin', 'text': [u'I have a lot of sun damage from my last pregnancy and playing a lot of pokemon go with my daughter over the summer. The pigmentation is still on my forehead from my last pregnancy, and around my neck from being in the car a lot. This product worked great on those spots. I do have an older spot on my neck that it did not work so great on back from my military days. But overall I am very happy with how the product performed, it feels great on my skin and I will be buying some on my own. I received this product complimentary from SKII in exchange for my honest review.'], 'author': u'raseco ', 'date': [u'2016-09-13'], 'location': u'Colorado Springs, CO', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Exceptional Skin Care', 'text': [u'My philosophy has always been beautiful skin begins with exceptional skin care. During my search for the \u201cexceptional\u201d product I have tried products, only to find that they have fallen short in relation to my skin care needs. Most contained parabens, sulfates, phthalates or a combination; but out of desperation I was willing to try them all. I have combination skin and my skin care needs change daily (I live in Michigan). I have uneven skin tone with dark & dry spots. Because of the uneven appearance of my skin, I was often perceived to be much older than I am. ', u'This product has meant the world to me. It has rejuvenated my skin & given it a glow that I have not seen in a long time! It REALLY works! I LOVE it because it does not go on greasy, it is easy to apply, it can be applied to combination skin, and the results are visible. Although the price point is somewhat higher, I will continue to purchase it because it is worth it! Finally, a product that meets all of my skin care needs! Thank you for my complimentary bottle of SK-II GenOptics Spot Essence! It definitely will not be my last!'], 'author': u'Red731 ', 'date': [u'2016-09-12'], 'location': u'Kalamazoo, MI', 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'DOES NOT REMOVE MAKE-UP', 'text': [u'I bought this cleanser because I love the product line, not worth the price, does not "dissolve" anything. It makes a filmy mess when trying to remove ANY type of make-up. I have a vast array of foundations and tried this cleanser multiple times. Does not remove any of them. You will need to use another cleanser and a scrub to remove the mess this cleanser makes. If you have extremely dry skin and want to create a barrier on your face, using this cleanser on clean skin may work for that. I rarely return products but this one had to go back.'], 'author': u'AllysonAmber ', 'date': [u'2016-10-05'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'2', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'Not bad, not great', 'text': [u'Bought because Tatcha\'s camellia cleansing oil was out of stock both times I tried to buy it last week. Figured I\'d give this one a try. Nothing terrible, except the pump. Not a huge fan of the strong scent but it fades pretty quickly. Overall, nothing great about this either. Will not repurchase after this bottle is empty, going back to Tatcha. I just prefer it over this one.'], 'author': u'selary ', 'date': [u'2016-09-18'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'4', 'age_link': None}

{'title': u'use it as a cleaser, not makeup remover!', 'text': [u'I had extremely dry and sensitive skin. I use La Mer moisturizer but it only soothes my skin, it doesnt heal the driness. I bought so many products I lost count how much money I\'ve spent until I met this oil cleanser! IT HEALED MY SKIN! My face is no longer red, and it doesnt sting anymore! I use it as a facial cleanser am and pm. I usually add 4 to 5 drops of rosehip oil I bought from Australia as well. It leaves my skin so soft amd hydrated. It created a barrier that seals the moist inside and no greasy feeling at all.And most amazingly, it makes my La Mer absorbed so fast! Before I had massage minutes before the moisturizer can be fully absorbed, but now it\'s absorbed in seconds! I trully love this product. it is a life saver. I can actually swim in a pool now without feeling stinged in my face. HOWEVER, it doesnt work as well as a makeup remover, especially when you have thick makeup on. Luckily I only use tinted cream or CC cream. Overall, its fantastoc for dry and sensitive skin. its probably not suitable for other skin types.'], 'author': u'LexieC ', 'date': [u'2016-08-24'], 'location': None, 'skin_type_link': None, 'rating_score': u'5', 'age_link': None}
